summary_bullets: Purpose: Sets UC standard allowance and related element amounts for 2026–2030.
Definitions: Includes CPI, standard allowance, relevant power, tax year.
Eligibility: Mentions claimant categories (pre-2026, severe conditions, terminally ill).
Obligations: Secretary of State must exercise regulatory powers to set amounts.
Payments: Provides step-based calculation (baseline → CPI → uplift).
Enforcement: No explicit penalties appear in Act.

Where the tax year is 2026-27, take the amounts of the standard allowance 
for tax year 2025-26. 
Where the tax year is 2027-28, 2028-29 or 2029-30, take the amounts resulting 
from Step 2 for the previous tax year. 
Step 2 
Increase the amounts identified in Step 1 by the relevant CPI percentage for 
the tax year.
